      • createGenerationSpec

        protected GenerationSpec createGenerationSpec()
                                       throws IOException,
                                              VerificationException
        Description copied from class: CodeGenerator
        Generate and populate a GenerationSpec object that contains the parameters and identifiers to be used by generated code. See the documentation for GenerationSpec for details on the fields that may be added to the spec.
        Specified by:
        createGenerationSpec in class CodeGenerator
        Returns:
        a populated GenerationSpec object that will be used to guide the code generator.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs when reading or transforming the data schema.
        VerificationException - if an error is detected in the the input schema specifications.

      • getIdentifierResource

        protected String getIdentifierResource()
        Description copied from class: CodeGenerator
        Get the name of a resource on the class path that contains the definitions of all user identifiers across the data set. These identifiers will be removed from all models after Phase 1 of processing, and will be used to generate Hadoop jobs to replace identifiers with semantically-meaningless IDs. See IdentitySchema for details on the format of this resource.
        Specified by:
        getIdentifierResource in class CodeGenerator
        Returns:
        a String containing the name of a classpath resource. A resource by this name must be available to the classloader that loaded this class.

      • getMainIdentifier

        protected IdentifierType getMainIdentifier()
        Description copied from class: CodeGenerator
        Get the common identifier that is used throughout the data set to uniquely identify an individual. See the description of the edu.harvard.data.identity package for more details on the main identifier.
        Specified by:
        getMainIdentifier in class CodeGenerator
        Returns:
        an IdentifierType that indicates the main identifier used to differentiate users across the data set.

      • getPhaseTwoAdditionsResource

        protected String getPhaseTwoAdditionsResource()
        Description copied from class: CodeGenerator
        Get the name of a resource on the class path that contains the definitions of any new or modified table that will be produced as a result of running Phase 2. This resource will guide the generation of the Phase 2 models and all later scripts. See ExtensionSchema for details on the format of this resource.
        Specified by:
        getPhaseTwoAdditionsResource in class CodeGenerator
        Returns:
        a String containing the name of a classpath resource. A resource by this name must be available to the classloader that loaded this class.

      • getPhaseThreeAdditionsResource

        protected String getPhaseThreeAdditionsResource()
        Description copied from class: CodeGenerator
        Get the name of a resource on the class path that contains the definitions of any new or modified table that will be produced as a result of running Phase 3. This resource will guide the generation of the Phase 3 models and all later scripts. See ExtensionSchema for details on the format of this resource.
        Specified by:
        getPhaseThreeAdditionsResource in class CodeGenerator
        Returns:
        a String containing the name of a classpath resource. A resource by this name must be available to the classloader that loaded this class.

      • getExistingTableResource

        protected String getExistingTableResource()
        Description copied from class: CodeGenerator
        Get the name of a resource on the class path that contains the definitions of any existing Redshift tables that should be loaded into the data pipeline before processing begins. See ExistingSchema for details on the format of this resource.
        Specified by:
        getExistingTableResource in class CodeGenerator
        Returns:
        a String containing the name of a classpath resource. A resource by this name must be available to the classloader that loaded this class.

      • getFullTextResource

        protected String getFullTextResource()
        Description copied from class: CodeGenerator
        Get the name of a resource on the class path that contains the definitions of all columns across the data set that contain unbounded text fields. These columns will be stored in S3, since their contents will be truncated in Redshift.
        Specified by:
        getFullTextResource in class CodeGenerator
        Returns:
        a String containing the name of a classpath resource. A resource by this name must be available to the classloader that loaded this class.

      • getPhaseZeroModificationResource

        protected String getPhaseZeroModificationResource()
        Description copied from class: CodeGenerator
        Get the name of a resource on the class path that contains definitions of any overridden fields in the original schema. This will normally be null, but is required in case a schema supplied by a third party is incorrect.
        Specified by:
        getPhaseZeroModificationResource in class CodeGenerator
        Returns:
        a String containing the name of a classpath resource. A resource by this name must be available to the classloader that loaded this class. If there are no field overrides required for the base schema, this method will return null.
